programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: When Rudy and Zoe feel nervous about getting ready for kindergarten, Ji-Young and Baby Bear host a game show all about school to help Rudy and Zoe learn about classroom rules and figuring out how to solve math problems.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: To make food shopping more fun, Alan turns it into a game. Elmo, Abby, and Cookie Monster need to find three foods that start with the letter C from different sections of the supermarket. Can they get the food in Alan’s cart before he finishes checking out?

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: It’s Song Day on Sesame Street. Mia learns how to sing a song in Spanish with help from her friends Nina, Rosita, and Lalo. She learns that she’s special just the way she is, no matter how much or little Spanish she speaks.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Fred the Flamingo is visiting Sesame Street for a family reunion. Elmo, Rudy, and Nina learn all about flamingos from why their smiles are upside down to how the color of their feathers change from white to pink.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Chris, Elmo and Abby help Fido feel proud that he’s a frog and find the right habitat to live in.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Lily, Qui, and Ji-Young are celebrating Lunar New Year on Sesame Street. They share with their friends Elmo, Charlie, Alan, and Grover how their families celebrate the same holiday, doing some things the same and different in a lot of other ways, too.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: Bubbles convinces the Professor to test his new transmogrifying ray on her new friend, Danny the Pony. But when it turns Danny into a monster instead, she must stop him before he destroys Townsville!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: After too much candy, Blossom and Buttercup have no memory of the night before and no idea where Bubbles is! They must piece together last night's events and find Bubbles before the Professor returns!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: Sick of being the tiniest kids at new school, the girls convince Professor Utonium to make them older! When they take too much, they become senior citizens, and a prime target for Mojo Jojo!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: When Bubbles breaks her arm and gets a powerful robotic cast, she must learn to stop being timid and embrace her 'smashy side' to defeat the sleazy, sinister Pack Rat!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: The Mayor becomes dependent on the Powerpuff Girls after Ms. Bellum departs, leaving the girls so busy, they hire the dangerous Bianca Bikini as his new assistant!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: Bubbles' excitement over being a contestant in The Townsville Pageant is ruined when Blossom and Buttercup become overbearing stage-sisters.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: After Bubbles wins two tickets to see their favourite band, Blossom and Buttercup vie for a ticket. When the Mayor's plane crashes, the girls must put aside their differences to save the day!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: During a fight, both Buttercup and Bubbles are surprised to discover they've 'levelled up', leaving Blossom to wonder when or if she'll get new powers, too.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: When Man-Boy returns to exact his revenge, Buttercup must embrace the balance between punching and hugging in order to defeat him.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: When a mysterious rainbow causes everyone to become unnaturally happy, the Powerpuff Girls must find where it ends to save the day and return Townsville to normal.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: Buttercup steals Octi to teach Bubbles a lesson, but ends up wanting to keep him for herself.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls S1
programme.desc: After a snow day saves Blossom from having to face a boy who's asked her out, she decides to use her ice breath to keep it going, even if that means plunging Townsville into eternal winter!

programme.desc: The Powerpuff Girls get suspicious of the Professor's new girlfriend and conspire to break them up.

programme.desc: When Blossom gets overzealous with spring cleaning, she accidentally unleashes a group of evil spirits.

programme.desc: When the Professor's latest invention wreaks havoc in the house, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls to stop it before it escapes.

programme.desc: When Blossom can't join her favourite school club, she imagines what her life would be like if she joined other clubs.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragon’s bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out what’s really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Stoick wants to train his own dragon and enlists Hiccup to help him tame the most ferocious species yet.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Believing his father is disappointed in him, Hiccup sets out on a dangerous treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: After a visit from Trader Johan, the dragons fall mysteriously ill and Hiccup and his friends must save them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own – Wu and Wei.

programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;he’ll need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkle’s super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a “No-Paperworkist” movement to avoid Buddy From HR’s constant paperwork.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.desc: When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Peabody and Sherman accidentally create a Black Hole after skipping their chores; Winston Churchill runs away to hide in a baby nursery to avoid work.

programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Dragon Quest The unlucky staff of a medieval-themed restaurant in Deedstown, get an unfriendly visit from Professor Thurdigree Burns. Opposite Day When Wolfie's experiment with moonlight goes awry, everyone but Casper turns into his or her opposite.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Smartysaurus is trying out her new jet pack, but she hasn't read the instructions before taking off and cannot control it properly. Noddy investigates to help her control it before things get too dangerous.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring… He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Elimination Game
programme.desc: Navy SEAL Rick is sentenced to rot in a military prison until he is offered the opportunity to put his life on the line and win his freedom in a kill or be killed reality show. Rick will have to eliminate some of the world's most notorious killers on live TV to gain his freedom and clear his name. Can he succeed finally?

A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: It's the penultimate commitment ceremony and, while some couples are going from strength to strength, two couples will leave the experiment - and their marriages - for good.

programme.title: Revenge For My Mother
programme.desc: Audrey teaches postnatal fitness to a group of mothers. However, when her recently hired assistant starts exacting revenge, Audrey's perfect world of mums and babies erupts into madness and murder.

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2
programme.desc: From Seoul to Busan, this spectacular eating show takes place at famous bakeries/patisseries to give the dessert lovers the glimpse of tasty goodness of some of the most-coveted desserts of all.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants known for serving up old world comfort food classics: Veselka in New York City and Canter's in Los Angeles. Buddy learns Veselka's time-honoured technique of making pierogies.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants that thrive on recipes handed down through generations. First, he heads to Mamoun's Falafel, then off to Nashville to visit Silver Sands Cafe.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael comes on strong with a flavourful pork chop pizzaiola, made with blistered tomatoes, onions and garlic, cooked à la plancha.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Pad Thai is a crowd favourite, and less intimidating to make than you might think. This recipe literally takes minutes, so Rachael makes the dish twice, with shrimp and with chicken.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael shows us how to make an impossibly delicious brunch menu of parm frittata with tomato sauce, served with a side of sausage and a simple salad that you can eat all day.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: This classic childhood combo gets an adult makeover that will make your mouth water. Rachael shows us her version of creamy tomato soup and a spicy grilled cheese.

programme.title: All Fixed Up In An Empty Village (S3)
programme.desc: The celebrity directors begin donating to the piggy bank for the project, but then Na-rae reveals a surprising sum: 10 million KRW from her own pocket! What’s the story behind this shocking amount?

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: Junho, who had chosen a ₩7,500-per-night room during their last Vietnam trip, is back as the lodging dokbakja for their Thailand adventure. With both excitement and anxiety, the Dokbakz follow Junho.

programme.title: Vacation Home Nightmare

programme.title: Pakboys Takusa
programme.desc: Four playboy husbands sneak out to be with other women. But when one of them dates a girlfriend of a mafia boss, their lives are put at stake.

programme.title: War Freak
programme.desc: Jack Llamas (Cesar Montano) is a dedicated half-Chinese cop being forced to marry a woman he does not love. Liza's (Jack's girlfriend) death pushes Jack to the edge, making him extremely irritable and sometimes violent. Jack has become every inch a warfreak.

programme.title: On Vodka, Beers and Regrets
programme.desc: A washed up actress and former child star Jane Pineda (Bela Padilla), battles with love, chances and alcoholism as her career plummets to rock bottom.

programme.title: The Barker
programme.desc: Coco (Empoy Marquez), is a simple jeepney barker who falls in love with Bella (Sky Carlos). Desperate to prove himself to Bella's family, Coco puts his life on the line to save them from kidnappers.

programme.title: Through Night and Day
programme.desc: Ben and Jen's relationship is put to test as they embark on a trip of a lifetime to Jen's lifelong dream destination - Iceland.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Mahal
programme.desc: Lira (Kylie Verzosa), a prize-winning author, spends a week to finish her final novel. But when she meets Andrei (Zanjoe Marudo), a young documentarist, her plans start to change.

programme.title: Sisterakas
programme.desc: The childhoods of Bernice (Vice Ganda) & Detty (Ai-Ai Delas Alas) were world's apart, but they did have one thing in common: their father. Headed by the eccentric yet equally brilliant & talented Roselle (Kris Aquino) the competition gets tougher, and a string of events lead to the two company heads fighting over the once expendable Detty.

programme.title: Sa Huling Paghihintay
programme.desc: The first time Eric (Bernard Palanca) laid eyes on Geri (Rica Peralejo), he knew that he had met the love of his life. Little did he know that the short encounter was the beginning of a life-long delusion.

programme.title: Torotot
programme.desc: Torotot explores the story of two couples, why and how their marriages crumble and how their infidelity and passions have brought them tragic endings.

programme.title: Paloma
programme.desc: In an environment ruled by mores and conventions, is there a room where unorthodox love can bloom?

programme.title: General Emilio Aguinaldo
programme.desc: General Emilio Aguinaldo is a three-hour epic chronicling his political rise, his rivalries and his struggle against the Spanish and American colonizers. It aims to present a comprehensive narration of his life, achievements and even some controversial issues about him.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Mahal

programme.title: CSI S4 E11 - Eleven Angry Jurors
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: Maruja
programme.desc: The classic love story by Mars Ravelo came to life again on the motion picture screen. Maruja, the daughter of a rich landowner and Gabriel, the illegitimate son of a Spanish friar, first fell in love a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Joe Reyes...Mahirap Patayin, Masamang Buhayin
programme.desc: Action star Roi Vinzon plays honest cop Joe Reyes. On a surveillance mission, he is able to record government Undersecretary Ruiz offering protection to foreigners regarding their illegal activities in exchange for money on video.

programme.title: Love Notes
programme.desc: The popular radio and TV show for lonely hearts hosted by DJ Joe D'Mango came to the big screen with two stories of young love based on letters from listeners.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: Silakbo
programme.desc: A killer-rapist was on the prowl and all of the victims seemed to have had some sort of connection with the maverick NBI agent, Andy, played by Cesar Montano.

programme.title: Muling Buksan ang Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Too much love suffocates and covetousness can breed hate.

programme.title: Paano Tatakasan Ang Bukas?
programme.desc: Desiree and Gilbert are in love but no one seems to believe it.

programme.title: Topo-Topo Barega
programme.desc: "Topo Topo Barega", an expression meaning "All for one, One for all." What each earns individually becomes the money of all. The problem of one worries the rest.

programme.title: Anino sa Dilim
programme.desc: Randy (Erwin Montes) and Mitch (Sara Gomez) invites two other couples to spend a relaxing vacation in Randy's rest house. But soon, the vacation turns into a nightmare as the guests turn up dead one after the other.

programme.title: Bakit Manipis Ang Ulap?
programme.desc: When love takes everything you have, will you still fight for it? Chanda Romero and Laurice Guillen will take you to the bitter world of love, family, betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger ng Dose Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Dashinage: Pulling Throw
programme.desc: Though rarely seen, pulling throws are often used in clutch moments that inspire the reaction "So good!" Our search for the technique's roots leads us to a fishing town with a long sumo tradition.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Late April, spring has arrived in northern Japan. Travel the JR Ou and Gono Lines, discovering cherry blossoms, hiking a lush beech forest, soaking in a seaside spring and trying fermented soybeans.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Women-only trips and solo camping are some of the many ways that people enjoy camping in Japan. Camping can even serve as a method of preparing for disaster. We examine its increasing popularity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DESIGN X STORIES
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Ishikawa. The traditional culture of Ishikawa prefecture is reflected in its diverse arts and crafts. Join us on a design hunt in a region recovering from disaster.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.desc: In the 19th century, Japan opened its doors. The "Kimono Dress" - emblematic of a broader clothing revolution - sheds light on Japan's forward-looking strategy as it joined the global community.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: In summer, children gather at the street corners where Jizo statues stand for lively festivities. People pray for the health and success of their children during this cornerstone of faith.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 2
programme.desc: Murr, Joe, Sal and Q strike the wrong chord as music instructors and try to save face in a humiliating focus group face-off. Plus, tonight's big loser lacks the magic touch in a show-stopping punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 3
programme.desc: The guys must identify the Joker behind the humiliating commands in a voice disguising challenge. Then they call it quits with a cringe-worthy public announcement, and act as dinosaur experts with preposterous prehistoric lessons.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 4
programme.desc: The Impractical Jokers, Sal, Joe, Murr and Q meet after the show to talk about their favorite moments during the show not to mention the most uncomfortable, most embarrassing, most humiliating and most outrageous. It is a chance for the viewers to hear about all the behind the scenes mishaps and awkward scenes as well as see outtakes never seen before.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 5
programme.desc: Murr, Joe, Sal, and Q fumble through the aisles of a grocery store, and re-gift the kooky contents of a mystery bag. Then, the guys must seek out the chosen one, in an embarrassing needle-in-a-haystack challenge.

programme.title: Friends S5 18
programme.desc: Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Monica and Phoebe plan a surprise birthday party for Rachel. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

programme.title: Friends S5 19
programme.desc: Ross' flirting technique fails to impress a pizza-delivery woman. A surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: It feels good to be bad... Assemble a team of the world's most dangerous, incarcerated Super Villains, provide them with the most powerful arsenal at the government's disposal, and send them off on a mission to defeat an enigmatic, insuperable entity. U.S. intelligence officer Amanda Waller has determined only a secretly convened group of disparate, despicable individuals with next to nothing to lose will do.

programme.title: Justice League (2017)
programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes – Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash – it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Friends S5 20
programme.desc: While the men are out on a ride along with Gary, Emily leaves a message for Ross. Rachel, who was in Ross' apartment borrowing a blender, hears the message and accidentally erases it.

programme.title: Friends S5 21
programme.desc: Gary asks Phoebe to move in with him. Monica and Chandler join Ross and Joey in a game of catch that lasts for hours.

programme.title: Friends S5 22
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler take a road trip to Las Vegas, where Joey has landed the lead role in a movie. But the two argue and Joey goes on alone. Rachel has an eye infection.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 3
programme.desc: Our buyers go to war to win a locker packed with valuable vintage surf gear. Then, Brandon and Lori get stuck with a busted bin, but when they find a glass case filled with an unidentifiable goo, they're left wondering if this unit smells like moneyor just plain stinks. And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 4
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia. Then, Papa Bear and T-Money each scoop up low-grade bins, but when they each start to sift through their individual messes, one of them finds a childhood dream-come-true. Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 5
programme.desc: Our buyers lock horns to win a unit packed with valuable construction equipment. Then, Brandon and Lori spot something that no one else does, but they'll have to play it cool if they want to walk away with this golden score. And later, the day's final locker smells of gas and cash, but leads to a showdown that gets one of our buyers banned from the auction.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 6
programme.desc: Minds are blown when two of our buyers team up for a major score. It's an unlikely pair that, together, could make a pile of cash. Plus, Jesse takes a big gamble on some African art and sweats it out hard when the authenticity is questioned. And later, the day's final auction reveals contents so shocking our buyers may be shut out of this game completely.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Hey -- wish WE'D thought of that! TruTV counts down of the 20... uh, SMARTEST inventions to ever hit the market. There's a flask for your butt, a way to re-shape your meat, and the last doughnut security system you'll ever need. Our consumer-friendlycomics, including Sean Donnelly, Gilbert Gottfried, Chris Fairbanks, and Mike Trainor are on hand to finalize the sale. Order yours now!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war. One of them spies an authentic treasure hidden amongst the contents, but only one will walk away with the score. And later, a newbie steals a prize unit out from under our regulars and proves that she's here to play. Then, Brandon and Lori unearth a five-alarm find. If it works, they could be looking at a $20,000 pay day on this item alone.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 10
programme.desc: A covered car lures our buyers to bid big, but the reveal could be more than the winner bargained for. Then, as the temperature climbs to the hottest day of the year, Jesse loses out to Dan on a locker full of expensive tools. But just when it lookslike Jesse is out of the race, he comes back with his biggest score yet. And later, tempers swelter as the final auction of the day pits all of our buyers in a bidding war so intense, one of them cracks under the pressure.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 11
programme.desc: The competition is off with a bang as a locker full of fishing gear sparks fast and furious bidding war that leaves the winner with a surprise catch. Then, Lori butts heads with another bidder, but is it all just a mind-game to try and steal a goldenunit? And later, Papa Bear scoops up a locker for a hefty price, but when he starts digging he quickly discovers his prize possession isn't exactly street legal.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 1
programme.desc: The Jokers lack hospitality as bumbling bellhops, pitch bizarre inventions to a confused focus group, and serve lunch with a side of awkward when they man hot dog stands. Then, the guys reach for the sky to surprise tonight's big loser

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 2
programme.desc: Murr, Joe, Sal and Q strike the wrong chord as music instructors and try to save face in a humiliating focus group face-off. Plus, tonight's big loser lacks the magic touch in a show-stopping punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 3
programme.desc: The guys must identify the Joker behind the humiliating commands in a voice disguising challenge. Then they call it quits with a cringe-worthy public announcement, and act as dinosaur experts with preposterous prehistoric lessons.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 4
programme.desc: The Impractical Jokers, Sal, Joe, Murr and Q meet after the show to talk about their favorite moments during the show not to mention the most uncomfortable, most embarrassing, most humiliating and most outrageous. It is a chance for the viewers to hear about all the behind the scenes mishaps and awkward scenes as well as see outtakes never seen before.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 5
programme.desc: Murr, Joe, Sal, and Q fumble through the aisles of a grocery store, and re-gift the kooky contents of a mystery bag. Then, the guys must seek out the chosen one, in an embarrassing needle-in-a-haystack challenge.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 3
programme.desc: Our buyers go to war to win a locker packed with valuable vintage surf gear. Then, Brandon and Lori get stuck with a busted bin, but when they find a glass case filled with an unidentifiable goo, they're left wondering if this unit smells like moneyor just plain stinks. And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 4
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia. Then, Papa Bear and T-Money each scoop up low-grade bins, but when they each start to sift through their individual messes, one of them finds a childhood dream-come-true. Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 5
programme.desc: Our buyers lock horns to win a unit packed with valuable construction equipment. Then, Brandon and Lori spot something that no one else does, but they'll have to play it cool if they want to walk away with this golden score. And later, the day's final locker smells of gas and cash, but leads to a showdown that gets one of our buyers banned from the auction.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: They're your eyes and ears around the globe. CNA's network of correspondents shines a light on stories from their corners of the world, from groundbreaking events to up-and-coming trends..

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: Money Mind is all about how to save, how to invest, and how to better spend your money. The show brings you weekly personal finance tips to help you make all the right money moves in Asia. Because, personal finance matters.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Into the Vault S3
programme.desc: Podcast producer Rovik Robert investigates a mysterious murder of a British policeman in 1934, and discovers Singapore's gruesome past when guns and gangs reigned.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Detrimental

When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: 18-year-old Nicole Brown meets 30-year-old OJ Simpson while working as a hostess, sparking a whirlwind romance. Despite appearing as the perfect wife and mother, Nicole endures OJ's abuse in private.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: After a wild night on a party cruise, a young, beautiful, aspiring actress is found dead, but the circumstances around her death are both mysterious and tragic. Could her boyfriend know more?

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A professor and her long time boyfriend go on a cruise. Shortly after embarking, she is found dead. Authorities deem it an accident, but months later the boyfriend is charged with second-degree murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In June 1985, a 20-year-old 'Sucker Day' Festival Queen is found brutalised. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is in the hands of a local wealthy businessman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Travel blogger Carla Stefaniak went to Costa Rica to celebrate her 36th birthday. But when she was to arrive back home to Miami, her awaiting loved ones realised she never got on the plane.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: In April 1993, 35-year-old businesswoman Debbie Buxton is walking her dogs on her local riverbank when she crosses paths with David Bond, who has a history of unprovoked attacks on female strangers.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On the evening of 23rd April 2004, doting father-of-two Robin Chard is making his way home from a quiet night out with friends when his life is cruelly cut short by two men looking for trouble.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Steffanie is so traumatized by her past that she only feels safe online, but her family and friends worry that her online activity is causing harm. Matthew is surviving his teen years through his devices.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The tire track found at the Donna Bennett Johnston crime scene provided police with a long list of potential suspects, everyone in the Baton Rouge area who had purchased an Aquatred tire.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A woman struggles to deal with her husband's health issues and gets a DWI, while a father having too much fun draws attention to himself resulting in a gun possession charge.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A defendant wants a hip-hop superstar to be his lawyer; a man is convicted in a murder-for-hire plot; a woman attacks her attorney in court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A man in custody attempts a daring escape from court; a sovereign citizen argues with a judge about laws; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A man hangs on the hood of his car while his ex-girlfriend drives it on the highway. An intoxicated woman flees from airport police on a motorised suitcase; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A man leads police on a high-speed chase in a stolen mail truck. A restaurant owner is arrested after hiding drugs in a takeout box. A pizza delivery guy helps the cops arrest a thief; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: Desperate to stop the senseless shootings in her community, Detective Kenyata 'KeeKee' Taylor must find out why the latest teen victim was wearing a ski mask when he was killed.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa father of two is shot just blocks from his ex-girlfriend's house, detectives have to decide which of two persons of interest should be charged with his murder.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: After a former marine is gunned down in broad daylight, Tulsa detectives must track down a family of three. But, at trial, justice hangs on whether the gunman and victim are actually who they appear to be.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: After the remaining participant leaves the program, the sheriff and her staff process how to implement the feedback as the inmates continue serving their time.
